tooltip: Select the Queen Armos as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Armos focuses on sieging enemy bases.
Allows you to summon Queen Armos, a bloated support hero surrounded by swarms of disposable bodyguards.
Large Creature unit that lights targets on fire.
Rocktites spawn a pair of Burst Gohma when they are slain.
Burst Gohma now deal Fire Damage on death and can ignite enemy buildings.
